name: Pumpkin Spice (Umi)
description:
A coffee art rhythm game, made for the Cozy Fall Jam 2021.

Play the tutorial level to learn how to play. Spacebar or left-click to hit a beat.

Credits: 

Last Cup of Coffee, Comfi Beats

Dreamy Night, Comfy Beats

Windfall, TheFatRat

Unity, TheFatRat

Serenity, Prod. Riddiman
